thread.title: Instagram launches 30-second video ads, will start pushing ads globally on September 30
thread.title_full: Instagram launches 30-second video ads, will start pushing ads globally on September 30 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Instagram launches 30-second video ads, will start pushing ads globally on September 30
text: Instagram is expanding its advertising game globally and launching a couple of new capabilities for businesses to take advantage of. The company revealed in a blog post that advertisers can now create video ads of up to 30 seconds, leverage a new premium ad unit that benefits new product launches, and much more. And starting September 30, […] »
